animeDescription: The first episode is a motion capture of the Fujilog characters with Perfume's song with the raw data provided by the Perfume website.  The second episode is smooth/realistic CG animation on top of real life footage; it shows Fujiyama in his OSAM 1-gou that we see in the TV series.
animeRelated: ['Fujilog', 'Saitama-ken Zaijuu, Fujiyama Osamu, 33-sai, Mushoku (NEET).: Fujilog Nyuumon-hen']
